**Desktop:**
- OS: [e.g. Windows 11, macOS Sonoma]
- Browser: [e.g. Chrome 120, Firefox 121]
- Version: [e.g. 1.0.0]

**Mobile:**
- Device: [e.g. iPhone 15, Samsung S24]
- OS: [e.g. iOS 17.2, Android 14]
- Browser: [e.g. Safari, Chrome Mobile]

**Backend:**
- Runtime: [e.g. Node.js 20.10, Python 3.11]

## Context Tambahan
<!-- Informasi tambahan yang mungkin berguna -->

- Apakah issue ini blocking untuk development/production?

## Severity
<!-- Pilih salah satu -->
- [ ] Critical - Production down / Data loss
- [ ] High - Feature unusable / Major functionality broken
- [ ] Medium - Feature partially broken / Workaround available
- [ ] Low - Minor issue / Cosmetic problem
